channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1

item.title: Meta unveils its new Oakley Meta Vanguard smart glasses for athletes
item.description: The new smart glasses are geared toward runners, cyclists, and other athletes.

item.title: Shooting kills 3 officers and wounds 2 more in rural Pennsylvania. Police say the shooter is dead
item.description: Authorities have been investigating a shooting that killed three officers and wounded two more in rural southern Pennsylvania.

item.title: India leads the way on Google’s Nano Banana with a local creative twist
item.description: Indian users turning Google’s Nano Banana into a viral trend engine, from retro AI portraits to figurine-style selfies.

item.title: Hurricane Helene displaced thousands of students. Some struggled to get back on track with school
Meta unveils new smart glasses with a display and wristband controller
item.description: Meta showed off its newest AI-powered smart glasses, which have a display and are controlled by a wristband, at Meta Connect 2025.

item.title: Meta launches Hyperscape, technology to turn real-world spaces into VR
item.description: Meta launches Hyperscape into beta, allowing users to turn real world spaces into digital spaces for VR.

item.title: Nvidia AI chip challenger Groq raises even more than expected, hits $6.9B valuation
item.description: The fresh raise comes in above the rumored numbers when word leaked in July that it was raising.
